ComicInfo.Title: Who's Afraid of Officer Campbell; Decay; Inspiration; The Flaming Carroteer; Mr. Mamoulian: Toilet Paper; Litvinov's Book; Warehouse; Norma Jean's Knickers; The Mercy Man; The First Flower on the Moon

ComicInfo.Summary:
One person's obsession with what Marilyn Monroe wore under her dress for the classic scene from the movie "The Seven Year Itch."
Even with most of civilization destroyed, a guy's still gotta make a living.
